snippet: The project, at Davidson College in North Carolina, will offer high school students lessons in calculus, physics and macroeconomics.
abstract: Professors at Davidson College in North Carolina will design online lessons for high school students in Advanced Placement courses in calculus, physics and macroeconomics and make them widely available through the College Board and edX, a nonprofit online education venture.
lead_paragraph: The project, at Davidson College in North Carolina, will offer high school students lessons in calculus, physics and macroeconomics.

headline.main: Professors in Deal to Design Online Lessons for A.P. Classes
headline.print_headline: Professors in Deal to Design Online Lessons for A.P. Classes
